title: Understanding Brain Waves: Definition, Symbols, and States of Consciousness.
first_phrase: This text focuses on the main brain waves and their symbols, including alpha, beta, theta, delta, and gamma waves, providing a comprehensive understanding of each. It also describes the method of descending into deeper levels of consciousness through light, as well as ascending through personal magnetism. The last 200 tokens introduce a relaxation exercise in which one visualizes a bright light while breathing and then envisions their future world in the darkness. This exercise is part of a larger process developed by the neurolinguistic school, which believes in going beyond solely alpha waves to reach the full potential of one's consciousness.
